documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
knowledgment  of  this  point  underlies
Marilyn Adams’ rejection of the free will defense in her Horrendous Evils and the Goodness of God
(Cornell University Press, 2000).
**Genesis 22:2, quoted in the New Revised Standard Version, as given in The New Oxford An-
notated Bible.
